title: Diaspora diplomat, scientist Uldis Bluķis passes away
summary_full: On February 20th, Uldis Bluķis, a scientist and one of the founders and activists of the Baltic Appeal to the United Nations, passed away at the age of 93 in New York State, according to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
summary_public: On February 20th, Uldis Bluķis, a scientist and one of the founders and activists of the Baltic Appeal to the United Nations, passed away at the age of 93 in New York State, according to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
